name: Divya Jyothi Charitable  Trust

address: No.151/f, Premises of Bapuji Children's Home

briefDescription: The aim of the Trust is to strengthen the visually impaired in Social, Educational, Financial and Industrial fields. This Trust isgiving free Computer Training to visually impaired. Apart from this, it also imparts the training in English and all other cultural and Sports activities. It has undertaken the responsibility to train the visually impaired in Yoga Pranayama and Meditation and other such activities which normal people do. It is also providing the blind with all the Braille aids and appliances. In this way the Trust is looking for all-round progress of the blind.
